personal_details.name: Abhinav Gupta
personal_details.location: San Francisco Bay Area, CA, USA

work_authorization.status: Authorized to work in USA (F-1 OPT STEM)

professional_summary.title: AI/ML Engineer
professional_summary.summary: CS Engineer with 2+ years' experience across Software Engineering, AI/ML, and Data. Delivered forecasting, NLP pipelines, and production apps; comfortable across Python/JS, ML frameworks (PyTorch, HF), and cloud (AWS/GCP/Azure).
key_skills: Data: Postgres, MongoDB, MySQL, Firebase, Redis

work_experience.description: Built forecasting, retention modeling, and LLM-based moderation to support community engagement analytics.
key_achievements: Developed time series forecasting using Prophet in Python; integrated Khoros API to predict user engagement; achieved ~90% accuracy for actionable insights.
Designed user retention model (decision trees) using engineered engagement features; produced Power BI reports to inform content strategy and reduce churn risk.
Built LLM-powered content moderation workflow on Khoros Care by fine-tuning Llama on internal data to flag spam/bot content on Esri Community; increased moderation efficiency by ~60%.

work_experience.description: NLP pipeline for aviation incident reports with clustering, classification, deployment, and large-scale EDA.
key_achievements: Engineered BERT-based embeddings in PyTorch; clustered with Gaussian Mixture Model to categorize incident factors.
Created multi-class classifier achieving F1-macro 0.86 to auto-tag new incident reports; built Streamlit app for review.
Processed ~200k records with Pandas/NumPy; produced EDA on ASRS dataset for incident cause trends and visualizations.

work_experience.description: Built and maintained full‑stack applications, analytics dashboards, and backend services for program operations.
key_achievements: Designed and deployed full‑stack web app using Flask (Python), JavaScript, and Firebase Auth for a 10,000‑participant program.
Implemented backend logic and database ops on Firebase Realtime DB for registration, tracking, and performance reporting.
Developed Power BI dashboard with SQL-backed data; integrated 175k+ student records; +40% web traffic and +30% lift in conversion rates.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology – Computer Science Engineering

projects.name: Auto-DocGen – AI Powered API Documentation Pipeline
projects.description: CLI to parse Flask apps via AST and generate OpenAPI 3.0 using a Pydantic agent with GPT-3.5‑turbo; integrated Swagger UI and CI/CD to keep interactive API docs in sync.
achievements: Automated doc generation and deployment; ensured browser-accessible, always‑up‑to‑date API docs.

projects.name: Multimodal SignToText Retrieval with Enhanced Facial Features
projects.description: Addressed missing facial features in SLR using PyTorch, MediaPipe, and Transformer‑based CLIP; video‑to‑text (V2T) retrieval with pose/landmark features.
achievements: Transformed 80+ hours of video; achieved ~30% higher Recall in SLR with explicit non‑manual cues.

projects.name: Mitigating Catastrophic Forgetting in Continual Learning
projects.description: Class‑incremental continual learning with PyTorch using Dynamic Layer Expansion, VAEs, and GANs; applied to CIFAR100.
achievements: Achieved ~68% accuracy across 10 tasks on CIFAR100 (≈6x over vanilla baseline).

preferences.career_goals: Advance as an AI/ML engineer building scalable ML systems and data products; grow into senior/lead roles driving 0→1 initiatives.

common_questions.why_leaving: Seeking new challenges and growth opportunities in AI/ML space
common_questions.strengths: Strong problem-solving, rapid learner, end-to-end ownership, cross-functional collaboration
common_questions.weaknesses: Can be detail-oriented; actively improving prioritization and delegation
common_questions.salary_expectations: Open to discussing total compensation commensurate with role, scope, and location
questions_for_them: What does career growth look like in this role?
What are the biggest challenges the team is facing?
